Name: CPE100 - Computer Programming
Description: Fundamentals of programming concepts using C language. Covers variables, control structures, functions, and basic data structures.

Name: CPE111 - Discrete Mathematics for Computer Engineers
Description: Sets, relations, propositional logic, predicate logic, mathematical reasoning, proof techniques. Sequences and summation, mathematical induction. Counting, permutation, combination, and discrete probability. Number theory. Logic programming, graphs, trees, and related algorithms. Finite automata, context-free grammar, and the Turing machine.

Name: CPE112 - Data Structures
Description: Fundamentals of data structures using C language. Covers arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and basic algorithms.

Name: CPE121 - Basic Circuits and Electronics
Description: Fundamentals of basic circuits and electronics. Covers circuit components, Ohm's law, Kirchhoff's laws, and basic circuit analysis techniques.
